definition: each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)

sentences.english: Your behaviour is not congruous with your rank.
sentences.chinese: 你的行为和你的社会地位不相称。

sentences.english: Its length is rather disproportioned to its breadth .
sentences.chinese: 其长度和宽度很不相称。

sentences.english: How do we celebrate Christmas in ways worthy of the calling of being Christians?
sentences.chinese: 我们要如何与所蒙作基督徒的呼召相称地庆祝圣诞？

sentences.english: There have been many years since Song Ziwen and Zhang Xueliang made friends.
sentences.chinese: 宋子文与张学良相交多年，两人以兄弟相称。
工作中权利和责任不相称。

sentences.english: As you can see, people advertise disproportionately high salaries for themselves.
sentences.chinese: 可以看到，人们都在给自己标上不相称的高工资。

sentences.english: You should dress in a way that befits a woman of your position.
sentences.chinese: 你的穿着应与你这种位置的妇女相称。

sentences.english: If equal affection cannot be, bikinis 2010, let the more loving be me.
sentences.chinese: 要是没无相称的爱，这就让我爱多一些吧。

sentences.english: You shall dress in a way that befit a woman of your position.
sentences.chinese: 你的衣著应与你这种地位的妇女相称。

sentences.english: The cost of public invitation is so high as not to match the value of the procurement project.
sentences.chinese: 公开招标的成本过高，与采购项目的价值不相称的。

sentences.english: The Rogue ability Mutilate now does its appropriate damage based on talents.
sentences.chinese: 盗贼技能毁伤现在造成基于天赋的相称伤害。

sentences.english: That's equivalent to running a 6-minute mile race.
sentences.chinese: 这相称于运行6分钟一英里的比赛。

sentences.english: Is it commensurate with the need and challenge that we face?
sentences.chinese: 与我们面临的需求和挑战是否相称？

sentences.english: We spent the next six months trying to find a match for it.
sentences.chinese: 我们又花了六个月想着另一个和其相称的名字。

sentences.english: Students complained that his casual manner was not befitting of a haiku master.
sentences.chinese: 学生抱怨他的闲散方式和俳谐师身份不相称。

sentences.english: The price of the commodity is ill-matched with its value.
sentences.chinese: 这件商品的价钱与它的价值很不相称。

definition: to consider oneself as/to believe oneself to be
to address sb directly by name (idiom)/to address sb by name without using an honorific title (indicating either familiarity or overfamiliarity)
to contrast/to set off one another/to go well with
close relation, no gap (idiom); intimate and nothing can come between
as close as one's hands and feet (idiom); loving one another as brothers/deep friendship/closely attached to one another
to become sworn brothers or sisters/sworn (brothers)
of the same generation/person of the same generation/peer
